@@ -0,0 +1,44 @@
+= Steps available out of the box
+
+Here one could find description of the steps that delivered with Vividus itself without any plugins required.
+
+=== While-like steps executor
+
+==== *_Info_*
+
+Executes steps while condition or iteration limit reached.
+
+[IMPORTANT]
+If iteration limit reached no failure or exception will happen
+
+==== *_Wording_*
+
+[source,gherkin]
+----
+When I execute steps at most $max times while `$variableName` is $comparisonRule `$expectedValue`:$stepsToExecute
+----
+
+==== *_Parameters_*
+
+. `$max` - iterations

nodes.bodyText:
... while variable '$name' is $comparisonRule...

lets make variable reference more explicit

nodes.bodyText: I think we need to document alias as well
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,44 @@
+= Steps available out of the box
+
+Here one could find description of the steps that delivered with Vividus itself without any plugins required.
+
+=== While-like steps executor
+
+==== *_Info_*
+
+Executes steps while condition or iteration limit reached.
+
+[IMPORTANT]
+If iteration limit reached no failure or exception will happen
+
+==== *_Wording_*
+
+[source,gherkin]
+----
+When I execute steps at most $max times while `$variableName` is $comparisonRule `$expectedValue`:$stepsToExecute

@@ -81,6 +81,54 @@ public void ifVariableNotSetPerformSteps(String name, SubSteps stepsToExecute) } } + /** + * Executes the steps while variable doesn't have a value fitting defined rules or limit is reached. + *
+ * Example: + *
+ * + * When I execute steps at most 5 times while `var` is < `3`: + *
+ * |step | + *
+ * |When I click on element located `id(counter)` | + *
+ * |When I set the text found in search context to the 'scenario' variable 'var'| + *
+ * + * @param max Maximum iteration number + * @param name Variable name to check + * @param comparisonRule The rule to compare values + * (<i>Possible values:<b> LESS_THAN, LESS_THAN_OR_EQUAL_TO, GREATER_THAN, GREATER_THAN_OR_EQUAL_TO, + * EQUAL_TO</b></i>) + * @param expectedValue The expected value of the variable + * @param stepsToExecute The examples table with the steps to execute + */ + @When("I execute steps at most $max times while `$variableName` is $comparisonRule `$expectedValue`:$stepsToExeute") + @Alias( + "I execute steps at most $max times while '$variableName' is $comparisonRule '$expectedValue':$stepsToExeute") + public void executeStepsWhile(int max, String name, ComparisonRule comparisonRule, String expectedValue, + SubSteps stepsToExecute) + { + Matcher valueVerifier = comparisonRule.getComparisonRule(expectedValue); + int iterationsLeft = max; + while (iterationsLeft > 0 && variableValueFits(name, valueVerifier)) + { + --iterationsLeft; + stepsToExecute.execute(Optional.empty()); + } + } + + private boolean variableValueFits(String name, Matcher verifier)
